name: User Story
description: Define a single user story with acceptance criteria

fields.label: Story Title
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Suggest a concise story title that describes the capability

fields.label: User Type
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Identify the user persona or role for this story

fields.label: Action / Capability
fields.placeholder: e.g., export my project data to CSV
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Describe the action or capability the user wants

fields.label: Benefit / Value
fields.placeholder: e.g., I can analyze it in Excel
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Explain why the user wants this capability - what value does it provide?

fields.label: Context / Background
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Provide context about when/why this story matters

fields.label: Acceptance Criteria
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Generate specific, testable acceptance criteria for this story

fields.label: Story Points
fields.ai_assist_prompt: Estimate story points (1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13, 21) based on complexity
